arts.ttl: Juventus vs. AC Milan: matchday 6 ends with a bang
arts.sum: There are 106 official previous meetings between the two teams in Turin, from the establishment of the single group to today, that is from 1929/30, with a record of 51 Juventus wins, 28 draws and 27 Milan victories. Juventus is the Serie A 2025/26 team that scores the most goals with substitute players, 4: Vlahovic (2), Adzic and Cabal (1 each).

arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Massimiliano Allegri is now expected to make just one change to the starting eleven for Juventus-Milan, following the swift recovery of Fikayo Tomori. arts.ttl: Allegri confirms Athekame or Bartesaghi will start against Juve – choice is obvious

After playing the same left wing-back in the first five league games, Allegri will be forced to make a change tomorrow as Pervis Estupinan is suspended.
